original_text: Uzziah had an army of soldiers who were ready to fight battles. The king's secretary, Jeiel, and his officer, Maaseiah, put the soldiers into groups. They counted the soldiers in each group. Hananiah was the army captain who had authority over them.
korean_text: 웃시야에게 또 싸우는 군사가 있으니 서기관 여이엘과 병영장 마아세야가 직접 조사한 수효대로 왕의 지휘관 하나냐의 휘하에 속하여 떼를 지어 나가서 싸우는 자라

sentences.original_text: Uzziah had an army of soldiers
who were ready to fight battles
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 전투를 할 준비가 되어 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: The king's secretary, Jeiel, and his officer, Maaseiah,
sentences.korean_translation: 왕의 서기관 여이엘과 그의 장관 마아사야가

sentences.original_text: They counted the soldiers in each group
